title: Glorious Loft Style Living at the Top!
posting_body: ['Text ID #5804A to my cell for more info!', 'Progressive design defines these apartments.', 'Inspired by the Joseph Eichler school of architecture that doesn’t skimp on quality, residences feature eco-friendly bamboo floors, glass feature walls, walk-in closets, and expansive windows with views of downtown Dallas.', 'Just outside, residents can head to a live music performance, check out a gallery, or sample their pick of a diversity of cuisines.', 'APARTMENT FEATURES', 'Balcony/Patio/Terrace*', 'Ceiling Fan(s)*', 'Central A/C and Heat', 'High-Speed Internet Available', 'In-Home Washer/Dryer*', 'Linen Closet*', 'Live/Work Space*', 'Plank-style flooring*', 'Walk-in Closet*', 'Fully-Equipped Kitchen', 'Kitchen Island*', 'Modern/Gourmet Kitchen*', 'Pantry*', 'Stainless-Steel Appliances*', 'Open Concept', '*Select apartments', 'BUILDING AMENITIES', 'Gated Community', 'Smoke-free Community', 'Access-Controlled', 'Billiards/Game Room', 'Catering Kitchen', 'Conference Room', 'Entertainment Club Room', 'Lounge', 'Media Lounge', 'On-Site Retail', 'Premium Views', 'Screening Room', 'WiFi in Amenity Spaces', 'Fitness Center', '24-Hour Front Desk', 'Package Acceptance/Lockers', 'Show More', '*Select apartments']
